DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether statin pretreatment decrease myocardial infarct size patient acute myocardial infarction undergo primary percutaneous coronary intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Atorvastatin Administration Before Primary Percutaneous Coronary Intervention
DOC.criteria: Presence chest pain 30 minute less 12 hour symptom onset ST segment elevation 1 mm two contiguous lead presumably new onset leave bundle branch blockage Cardiogenic shock History myocardial infarction Chronic liver disease Previous current statin use
